name: Mobius Dungeon
description:
Let me know what you think on Twitter @llnesisll.

This is a game about getting lost in a Legend of Zelda-style labyrinth, and blowing things up.

Items you place in one room stay in the same place on-screen when you move to another room, giving you access to things you thought you couldn't reach. Mix this with a strangely-linked rooms - think the Lost Woods in Ocarina of Time! - and you have a mind-bending dungeon ready to be explored and speedrun :)

This game is made to be speedrun, and to be played more casually. Look for shortcuts for bomb placement; you should almost never need to stop moving from start to finish :)
